stories.original_headline: NASA brings Crew-11 home early in rare medical evacuation
stories.original_summary: SpaceX Crew-11 splashed down safely in the Pacific after more than five months in orbit aboard the International Space Station. The four astronauts completed over 140 experiments and traveled nearly 71 million miles around Earth. NASA brought the crew home earlier than planned due to a medical conce
stories.fantasy_headline: Sky-Voyagers Return Early from Grand Sky Citadel!
stories.fantasy_story: A brave group of Sky-Voyagers from the Grand Order of Sky-Farers returned swiftly from the floating Sky Citadel. They had completed many arcane studies while circling the realms high above. Due to a traveler's ailment, they made an early, safe return to the Great Waters, much to the relief of the Order.

stories.original_headline: Scientists found the soil secret that doubles forest regrowth
stories.original_summary: New research shows tropical forests can recover twice as fast after deforestation when their soils contain enough nitrogen. Scientists followed forest regrowth across Central America for decades and found that nitrogen plays a decisive role in how quickly trees return. Faster regrowth also means mor
stories.fantasy_headline: Nature Alchemists Uncover Woodland Rebirth Secret!
stories.fantasy_story: The wise Nature Alchemists have discovered a powerful secret for healing the land. They found that ancient groves can recover twice as fast after timberlands are cleared if the soil has enough special earth-dust. This magical nutrient allows trees to return quickly, bringing back the green realms.

stories.original_headline: The best deals on MacBooks right now
stories.original_summary: Apple currently sells MacBooks equipped with its own M-series processors in a wide range of sizes and price points, all of which run the company’s newest operating system, macOS 26. stories.fantasy_headline: Golden Apple Guild Offers Special Enchanted Mirror Deals!
stories.fantasy_story: The esteemed Grand Crafters' Guild of the Golden Apple is currently offering special prices on their enchanted scrying mirrors. These powerful artifacts, imbued with arcane cores, run on their newest Grand Enchantment. Adventurers seeking new magical tools can find great value now, simplifying the quest for the perfect device.
